error_bad_recipient: You cannot award OP a delta as the moderators feel that allowing so would corrupt the delta system. If you were trying to show the OP how to award a delta, please include the symbol in a reddit quote/code, or do so [here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=delta&subject=remind&message=delta) by clicking 'send'. Thank you.
error_length: This delta is currently disallowed as your comment doesn't include enough text ([comment rule 4](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/rules#wiki_rule_4)). Please add an explanation for how /u/delta changed your view in an edit. Responding to my comment will cause me to recheck yours. Thank you.
error_submission_history: You have already awarded /u/delta a delta in this comment tree. [See here](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/deltabot) for an explanation of the delta system and its restrictions. Thank you.
congrats_first_body:
Congratulations! You've earned your first delta!

As you may already know, a delta (Δ) is given when a comment has changed someone's view. For a more detailed explanation of the delta system, [see here](/r/ChangeMyView/wiki/delta).

I have updated your user flair and created [your own wiki page](/r/ChangeMyView/wiki/user/{0}) which will be updated every time you earn a delta. If you do well, you may find yourself on our [scoreboards](http://www.reddit.com/r/ChangeMyView/wiki/scoreboards).

Good luck, and happy CMVing!

_____

*[^I ^am ^a ^bot](https://github.com/PixelOrange/MARS)^, ^and ^this ^action ^was ^performed ^automatically. ^Please [^contact ^the ^moderators](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/ChangeMyView) ^if ^you ^have ^any ^further ^questions ^or ^concerns.*
remind:
To award a delta, the following criteria must be met:

1. A valid delta symbol (mobile users: type !delta) must appear somewhere in the message.

2. The comment must be at least delta long.

3. The delta cannot be awarded to the redditor that submitted this CMV topic.
remove_low_effort: This delta has been removed as your comment doesn't include enough text ([comment rule 4](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/rules#wiki_rule_4)). Please add an explanation for how /u/delta changed your view in an edit. Responding to my comment will cause me to recheck yours. Thank you.
remove_remind: This delta has been removed as it appears you accidentally awarded one while showing someone else how to use the delta system. To avoid this, include the symbol in a reddit quote or code, as I [will ignore this](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/deltabot#wiki_ignored_deltas). Thank you.
remove_abuse: This delta has been removed as the moderators believe you are misusing or abusing the delta system.
